name: W4TCH-3R
description:
W4TCH-3R is an action platformer with puzzle elements. The main character with the help of an eletric granade launcher will fight his way through a facility of twisted machines and traps.

Game done by:
    Bruno de Souza Guimarães.
    Eduardo Henriques Kerr.
    Pedro Lucas Vilarino Siqueira.

Artist: https://www.artstation.com/pedrolvs
